title: Clues and meanings about the interpretation of fish in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing grilled fish? Evidence of the dreamer’s desire to travel to gain knowledge. Interpretation of seeing a girl eating fish in a dream? Evidence of abundant nutrition. What is the interpretation of seeing fish in a married woman’s dream? Evidence of goodness and a lot of money. Interpretation of seeing a dead fish in a dream? Elements To deal with many difficulties and conflicts. Interpretation of seeing a brown fish in a dream? A good sign for someone who wants to get married. Interpretation of a dream about fish by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about fish in a dream has many interpretations revealed by the scholar Ibn Sirin, as it indicates immorality if seen on earth. A person who sees in a dream a fish with a pearl in it is a sign of a male child. Seeing grilled fish is a sign of the dreamer’s desire to travel to gain knowledge. Many fish in a dream indicate women. Seeing fish in a dream in abundance, but the dreamer does not know how many there are, is evidence of... Follow a broad, good and abundant diet. Eating fish in a dream is a sign of halal money that the dreamer will receive. Seeing a dream about fish for single people. Fish in an unmarried girl’s dream is a sign of goodness and fulfillment of the desire she wants. Eating fish in a girl’s dream is evidence of a diet. The wide and spacious that you will eat in the near future. Cooked fish is evidence of having a lot of money. Interpretation of a dream about fish for a married woman. Seeing fish in a married woman’s dream is a sign of good luck and a lot of money. Seeing a married woman taking fish from her husband is a sign of pregnancy soon. Seeing Dead fish in a dream is a sign that you will face many difficulties and conflicts. Seeing a married woman eating grilled fish in a dream is a sign of envy. Seeing a dream about fish for a man. Seeing a merchant in a dream that he is catching fish, this is evidence of profit from trade and it will be legal money. Seeing fish Fresh in a dream is evidence of great profit and abundant nutrition that the dreamer will receive. Dead fish in a dream is a sign of fertility and hostility if eaten. Seeing uncooked fish in a dream means that he will marry a girl for moral and religious reasons. Interpretation of a dream about fish according to Nabulsi. Brown fish in a dream is a sign of kindness. Towards the person who wants to get married. Seeing dead fish in the sea can indicate unpleasant things in the case of a sick person. Seeing more than one fish in a dream is evidence of polygamy. Seeing him eating salty fish is evidence of the crises he faces. Joy in a dream. See grilled fish, shrimp. title: Learn the interpretation of seeing someone you love in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a beloved in a dream: A dream of a beloved is one of the visions that arouse the emotions of the viewer and confirm to him some of the suspicions that were visiting him, and this vision has many interpretations that differ according to different considerations, such as those that can see the death of the beloved or before it, or see her with another person, or marry him, or cry, and he may He betrays you or leaves you, so the cases of this vision and its complex details differed. What concerns us in this article is to clarify all the special cases and indications of seeing a lover in a dream. Learn about the interpretation of seeing someone you love in a dream from Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream. Seeing love expresses personal obligations, Blindness to seeing the truth, listening to the voice of the heart without a second thought, narrowness in attachment and the inability to put an end to the tyranny of feelings to make decisions. If one sees his beloved in a dream, this indicates situations and events in life that have great importance in the fortuneteller’s awareness and memories that cannot be Forgetting her, no matter how long it takes. This vision is also an indication of the lover’s constant thinking, attachment to her to an extent that is difficult to describe, constantly repeating her name, thinking about the future of the relationship, how the situation will develop, and fear of the rug. It will be pulled from under his feet at all times. I see Nabulsi. Extreme love shows preoccupation with useless things, and neglect and living in illusions will not benefit a person in his afterlife. Seeing a loved one also shows the constant fear that the dreamer feels and anxiety that all his efforts will fail miserably or that he will be exposed to misery. After many attempts.Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing love symbolizes passion, excitement, haste, attachment to things that the dreamer may not acquire in the long run, and the heart’s preoccupation with remembering people. Seeing the beloved also expresses the secrets that the viewer keeps inside, and feelings Which he cannot express properly. This vision also suggests working hard to reach a great stage of self-confidence and self-respect and giving him his natural right to respect and reverence. And if you see someone you love in your dream, this indicates over-thinking and worrying that things will conflict with Your expectations and a sharp deterioration in the psychological aspect. If the dreamer sees his beloved smiling at him, this indicates peace, friendliness, and happy moments that the dreamer lives with his beloved. The vision could be an indication of the depth of the dispute and the frequent disagreements over superficial matters, and entering into heated discussions without the ability to develop solutions. A process to end this matter. In short, this vision is a reflection of the reality of the relationship between the dreamer and his lover, and the serious desire to take serious steps forward and think about marriage. Interpretation of seeing a lover in a dream for someone: Seeing a dear person in a dream symbolizes intense love and passion, sensitive feelings, and preoccupation with the mind , loss of emotional control, lack of sleep, and physical exhaustion. This vision also indicates critical periods in which the viewer must make his final decisions.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman giving birth

preview.html: Seeing the birth of a boy in a dream indicates the ease of her birth and that she will give birth in suitable circumstances, God willing, and it shows you the livelihood that she will obtain in her life and you have more interpretations from our interpreter website. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a boy in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that she is pregnant and gives birth to a boy in a dream, and she was very happy with him in the dream. This is an indication that she will achieve something great that she has always sought in her life at this time, and God knows best. And seeing a girl in a dream sees her close friend giving birth to a boy, and she was trying to help her in the dream. It indicates that this single girl will see some difficult things in her life, but she will be able to overcome them. And the dream of the unmarried girl who saw that she was pregnant from her fiancé, and she was giving birth to a boy in a dream, and it was very beautiful in the dream. The meaning indicates the good things that this single girl will see in her life after getting rid of the problems. And the unmarried dreaming woman who sees in a dream that the unmarried girl was sitting with a young boy in a dream and playing with him. This is an indication that this single woman will get a lot of good and livelihood in her life during this time, God willing God. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the birth of a son for a married, single and pregnant womanInterpretation of seeing the birth of a child in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman dreams that she is giving birth to a boy in a dream and she is very happy with his appearance in the dream and his small size. It shows that she will become pregnant soon, God willing, and this pregnancy will make her very happy. If a married woman has previously given birth to children and sees in a dream that she gave birth to a beautiful boy in a dream. It shows that this married woman will be able to get rid of the sad things she is going through now. Seeing a married woman in a dream means that she was looking at the birth of a child in a dream by a woman close to her in life. It announces that he will succeed in an important and great matter in life, and he has been working hard for a long time, and God is higher and more knowledgeable. Such as a married woman who sees in a dream that her husband is helping her give birth to a boy in a dream and is happy with his presence. The closeness and understanding that exists between this married woman and her husband in life is clear and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the birth of a child in a dream for a divorced womanIf a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is giving birth to a boy in a dream, and he was big in the dream and beautiful in shape. It explains that During this period, she will get rid of all the problems and troubles that she is going through in her life. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream means that she is helping a pregnant woman to give birth to a child, and she was very happy in the dream. It indicates that she will achieve something she wanted very much in her life during this time and God will help her. The divorced woman who is looking in the dream for the boy who gave birth to her and did not find him in the dream and she is very sad. This is an indication that she has lost something big and important in her life during this time, and that this matter will bother her, and God knows best. The divorced woman who dreams that she will give birth to a boy, and feels tired and exhausted in the dream. It explains the many problems that this divorced woman will face

Seeing a married woman in a dream means that she was looking at the birth of a child in the dream from Kissing a woman who is close to her in life. He announces that he will succeed in an important and great matter in life, and he has been striving for a long time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Like a married woman who sees in a dream that her husband is helping her give birth to a boy in a dream and she rejoices in his presence. The closeness and understanding that exists between these A married woman and her husband in life are clear, and God knows best. The interpretation of seeing the birth of a child in a dream for a divorced woman: If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is giving birth to a boy in a dream, and he was big in the dream and beautiful in appearance. It explains that during this period she will get rid of all the problems and troubles that she is going through in her life. Seeing a divorced woman in a dream means that she is helping a pregnant woman to give birth to a child, and she was very happy in the dream. It indicates that she will achieve something that she wanted very much in her life during this time and God will help her. And the divorced woman who is searching in the dream for the boy who gave birth to her and did not find him in the dream and she Very sad. This is an indication that she lost something big and important in her life during this time, and that this matter will upset her, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a brother in a dream: Seeing a brother in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of a dream about a brother for an unmarried woman, for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin, for a pregnant brother, living or deceased, young or old, the birth of my brother and sisters, my brother. A brother in a dream is one of the beautiful dreams that we dream about in our dreams often, as it comes in many different images that have many different interpretations of each dream, where The brother has a special and important place in our hearts in the great path that God has appointed for sisters, as it links sisters, for some of them are blood and one family in life, and the brother is the true bond of a person in life, which cannot be rejected. We review for you on our site the interpretations of seeing a brother in a dream from The great commentator Ibn Sirin, who mentioned it to us in his books on special interpretations of dreams, which has many important meanings and connotations. Interpretation of a brother in a dream: A human brother shows cooperation in money and helpers. A brother can symbolize the person who sees himself and does not necessarily refer to the brother. Seeing a brother means that you may get On a lot of money or earning it. The dreamer’s vision in a dream of a quarrel or disagreement with his brother is considered a symbol of the love and affection that unites the two brothers, except in one case, which is the presence of a dispute between the two brothers in reality due to a dispute over property or inheritance, for example, etc. In the event that we see The death of a brother in a dream is an indication of the emergence of a dispute and rivalry between the dreamer and his brother, especially if this death is accompanied by a vision of burying the brother. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he severely beats his brother, and he dies as a result of this beating, God forbid, this means that the dreamer will receive a moral benefit. Or materialistic in reality. The previous statement applies to a brother’s vision of his brother. As for the sister seeing her brother, it has another interpretation that varies according to the nature of the dream. If the sister sees that she is marrying her brother while she is single, this is a sign that she will get married soon. If she is married and has not yet given birth, then this is a sign of pregnancy. Seeing the older brother differs from seeing the younger brother as the older brother in In a dream, this is a sign of many good things, money, profit, and good luck, in the event that the dreamer sees his handsome brother. Seeing the younger brother in a dream is evidence of the arrival of happiness, hearing good news, or overcoming crises and relieving distress and anxiety, and this also if the younger brother appears in the dream in a coordinated and beautiful way. If the dreamer sees in a dream that God has blessed him with a new brother, a brother to him, then this portends to the pioneer that he will live a new life full of happiness and success and will be able to achieve his dreams and aspirations that he desires. Interpretation of a brother in a dream for single people. A young man’s vision of his brother taking money in a dream is evidence of earning money. Sustenance and abundant money coming to the dreamer. Seeing a sick young man in a dream is evidence of the obstacles and problems that the person suffers from. Seeing a person to whom a brother has traveled in a dream is evidence that the dreamer is traveling to work abroad. Seeing a young man killing his brother in a dream by stabbing him with a dagger or throwing a stone and returning To life is evidence that the visionary will receive moral support. Interpretation of a brother in a dream for a single woman. Seeing Fat

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a bride’s dream in a white dress, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a bride in a white dress has many connotations and meanings for those who have these visions and makes them want to know about it. In the following article, we will learn about the most important interpretations related to this topic that our esteemed scholars mentioned. Let us read the following. What is the interpretation of a bride in a white dress? Interpretation of a dream about a bride in a white dress indicates many benefits. Which the dreamer will enjoy in the coming days as a result of her fear of God (the Most High) in all her actions. If a woman sees in her dream a bride wearing a white dress, this is a sign that she will be able to achieve many things that she has always dreamed of and will be very pleased with them. In the event of seeing If a fortune-teller sees a bride in a white dress during her sleep, this expresses the good events that will happen in her life and will put her in a good psychological state. Seeing the dreamer in her dream that she is a bride wearing a white dress and she was sad symbolizes the many difficulties that she will face in the coming days and will make her very sad. Interpretation of a dream The bride in Ibn Sirin’s white dress. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees the bride in a white dress in a dream as a sign of abundant goodness that he will enjoy in the coming days. If a woman sees a white wedding dress during her sleep, this is a sign that she will receive a lot of money that will contribute greatly to improving Her financial situation. If the dreamer sees in her dream a bride wearing a white dress and her appearance is ugly, this indicates that she is surrounded by bad company that she does not like at all and who urges her to commit dishonorable acts. For the dreamer to see in a dream about the bride in the white dress and she is happy, symbolizes the good news that You will come to her and make her very happy. Interpretation of a dream about a bride in a white dress for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream with a bride wearing a white dress means that she excelled in her studies and got the highest grades at the end of the school year, which will make her family very proud of her. If the dreamer sees a bride in a dress White in her dream, this is a sign of the many achievements that she will achieve. If the dreamer sees the bride in the white dress in her dream, this means that she will get the things that she dreamed of getting and this will make her very happy. Seeing a girl in a dream with a bride wearing a white dress symbolizes that she She will get a lot of money that will enable her to do what she loves. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a wedding dress for a single girl: An unmarried woman’s dream in a dream that she is wearing a wedding dress is evidence that she will receive an offer of marriage from someone who suits her and she will agree to it immediately. If the dreamer sees herself during If she dreams that she is wearing a wedding dress, this is a sign of good news that will reach her ears and make her very happy. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is wearing a wedding dress and is engaged, this indicates that the date of her marriage contract is approaching and that she is entering a new phase in her life. Seeing a girl wearing a wedding dress in her dream symbolizes That her future partner will have many good qualities that will make her happy in her life with him. Interpretation of a dream about a dress

Interpretation of a dream The bride in Ibn Sirin’s white dress. Ibn Sirin interprets the dreamer who sees the bride in a white dress in a dream as a sign of abundant goodness that he will enjoy in the coming days. If a woman sees a white wedding dress during her sleep, this is a sign that she will receive a lot of money that will contribute greatly to improving Her financial situation. If the dreamer sees in her dream a bride wearing a white dress and her appearance is ugly, this indicates that she is surrounded by bad company that she does not like at all and who urges her to commit dishonorable acts. For the dreamer to see in a dream about the bride in the white dress and she is happy, symbolizes the good news that You will come to her and make her very happy. Interpretation of a dream about a bride in a white dress for a single woman: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream with a bride wearing a white dress means that she excelled in her studies and got the highest grades at the end of the school year, which will make her family very proud of her. If the dreamer sees a bride in a dress White in her dream, this is a sign of the many achievements that she will achieve. If the dreamer sees the bride in the white dress in her dream, this means that she will get the things that she dreamed of getting and this will make her very happy. Seeing a girl in a dream with a bride wearing a white dress symbolizes that she She will get a lot of money that will enable her to do what she loves. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a wedding dress for a single girl: An unmarried woman’s dream in a dream that she is wearing a wedding dress is evidence that she will receive an offer of marriage from someone who suits her and she will agree to it immediately. If the dreamer sees herself during If she dreams that she is wearing a wedding dress, this is a sign of good news that will reach her ears and make her very happy. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is wearing a wedding dress and is engaged, this indicates that the date of her marriage contract is approaching and that she is entering a new phase in her life. Seeing a girl wearing a wedding dress in her dream symbolizes That her future partner will have many good qualities that will make her happy in her life with him. Interpretation of a dream about a dress

title: The 13 most famous interpretations of seeing a mosquito in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a mosquito in a dream? Enemy elements and exposure to financial losses. What does it mean for a mosquito to enter the fortuneteller’s nose or throat? Evidence of the problems that the dreamer will face. What is the interpretation of seeing a mosquito in bed? This is testimony to the disreputable people in her life. What does it mean to see a mosquito Coming out of the mouth? Evidence of staying away from forbidden money. What is the interpretation of seeing a mosquito in an unmarried girl’s dream? Evidence of anxiety and pain. Interpretation of a dream according to Ibn Sirin’s law. A mosquito in a dream is a sign of enemies and financial losses. Whoever sees a mosquito bite in a dream, this indicates money that The dreamer will get it. The law may sometimes show sadness and anxiety. Seeing a mosquito entering the dreamer’s nose or throat is a sign of problems that the dreamer will face. Then seeing the law coming out of the mouth is evidence of staying away from forbidden money. Seeing a mosquito in the house is evidence of the presence of many enemies In the dreamer’s life. Seeing a mosquito in a dream by Nabulsi. If someone sees in a dream that he has killed a mosquito, this is a sign that he is facing difficulties. Killing a mosquito in a dream is a sign of happiness and joy. Killing a mosquito in a dream indicates the presence of enemies in the dreamer’s life. Then he sees being expelled. Mosquitoes from the house, this indicates disobedience and sins. Seeing a person in a dream that he is eating a mosquito, this indicates forbidden money, sadness, and hatred. Seeing a mosquito in a dream can be a cure for the sick person. Eating a mosquito can be evidence of gossip. Interpretation of a man’s dream about the law. Many Mosquitoes in a man’s dream are evidence of enemies and haters in his life. Then the traveler’s view above his head shows his fear of this journey. Killing a mosquito in a man’s dream means comfort and good health. If one sees a mosquito in a dream, it may indicate food, if one is chasing it. Seeing a dream of a mosquito for a single woman: A mosquito in an unmarried girl’s dream is evidence of worries and pain. Then, seeing a mosquito in a girl’s dream flying around her and being unable to kill it, this indicates the presence of an unfit person in her life. Then, when a girl sees a mosquito in bed, this is a sign of The presence of disreputable people in her life. If a girl sees in a dream that she is carrying a mosquito, this indicates problems and anxiety. Interpretation of the dream of the law for a married woman. Seeing a mosquito in a married woman’s dream indicates psychological fears and problems. Then seeing a mosquito in a married woman’s dream indicates things other than Desirable in the life of a married woman. If a married woman sees herself killing mosquitoes with insecticides, this indicates getting rid of worries and problems. If she sees a mosquito on her clothes, this indicates that there is someone who desires it.

title: Interpretation of camels in a dream

preview.html: Have you ever dreamed of a beauty? So, learn the interpretation of a camel in a dream to know its most important indicators for you. The camel is one of the most important desert animals and is distinguished by its ability to withstand hunger and thirst for a long time. It is called the “ship of the desert” because it symbolizes strength and patience, and seeing it in a dream arouses curiosity. Try to explain camels in different situations and we will tell you in the encyclopedia in detail these interpretations. Interpretation of camels in a dream Seeing a camel in a dream by Ibn SirinImam Ibn Sirin narrated that seeing a camel in a dream indicates the achievement of the dreamer’s goals and aspirations on the ground, as well as in the case of riding. If the dreamer sees that he is riding A camel, but he does not know his exact destination, then this dream indicates that he will face many problems in his life. If the dreamer sees that he is milking a camel, then this dream refers to some actions that he performs without full awareness of their consequences and ramifications, and this dream represents a message to the dreamer of the need to return Consider these actions. In the case of drinking camel milk, this dream expresses the desires that one wants to achieve in reality. Ibn Sirin also explained that if the dreamer sees a camel running behind him, then this dream indicates success and success in work. In the case of cooking camel meat This vision symbolizes an important event awaiting in the dreamer’s life. If a camel is being dragged in a dream, this indicates the obstacles and problems that prevent him from getting married if he is single. Interpretation of a camel in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. As for the translator Ibn Shaheen, he mentioned that seeing a camel in a dream From unpleasant visions. If you ride it in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer will face many difficulties and problems, if the dreamer is unable to ride it in the dream. If a camel is slaughtered inside the house, this vision indicates the death of one of the residents of that house, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees that he is walking with a group A large herd of camels, then this dream indicates that he will soon assume a leadership position, and God knows best. If a man sees that he is eating a camel’s head, then this dream indicates bad deeds. Ibn Shaheen also mentioned in the interpretation of this dream that seeing the dreamer walking with a camel on the sand, then this The vision is evidence of his effort to reach goals with difficulty and difficulty. If he slaughters a camel and eats its meat, then this dream indicates that the dreamer is afflicted with diseases. If the dreamer sees that he cannot ride a camel, then this dream suggests two interpretations: the first shows the obstacles and problems he faces, and the second symbolizes his imprisonment. Unjust. To see yourself buying a lot of camels means that you will obtain your livelihood after patience and hardship. If a man sees an angry camel in a dream, then this dream is hateful and symbolizes an evil and evil person in his life in reality. Riding a camel easily in a dream indicates an opportunity to travel and God I know. But if the dreamer finds in this dream that he is separating the camel’s bones from the camel’s meat, then this vision is abhorrent to him and indicates the loss of his money, and God knows best. Seeing a camel in a dream for a single woman. Regarding the case of an unmarried woman, Ibn Shaheen mentioned that seeing a camel in a dream means She will get married soon, and if...

title: Interpretation of a dream about work and seeing work in a dream

preview.html: Seeing work in a dream means lawful profit, wealth, and other interpretations. We will explain this to the single girl, married, pregnant, divorced woman and man, how to see a job interview, see the workplace, work in a store or company, a new job, a contract in the department or a report in my old country. The work of Ibn Sirin and others in continuation of the topic: Interpretation of work or work in The dream indicates work in a dream. With regard to the dreamer’s diligence, facing life’s struggles and his quest to make money, and seeing a job in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer, despite all the difficulties and suffering he faces, will not abandon the path of truth. To earn a little money, but with the sweat of his brow and in a lawful way. If anyone sees incomplete work in a dream, incomplete, that is, it is possible that this dream indicates unemployment. Seeing incomplete work in a dream may indicate that what a person desires will not be achieved if he fails in trying to achieve it. One saw a job and its owner completed it perfectly in a dream, then this dream may indicate happiness in life. Whoever sees that she is doing a good job in a dream, it is possible that this dream indicates that he will have children so that they will obey him. If the owner of the vision sees a job in a dream, this dream may indicate Wealth and gaining money If one sees a job in a dream, this dream may indicate that the person thinks a lot about achieving his dreams. In addition to the above, some of them said that seeing a job in a dream may indicate that one may be unemployed and must look for a job and rely on God. Whoever dreams that he is busy with work, then he will marry a virgin servant and leave her, because God Almighty says {Indeed, the inhabitants of Paradise today are busy and fruitful}. Whoever sees in his dream that he is busy, then he will marry a virgin servant, and this indicates marriage, marriage, and the removal of a virgin, for God Almighty says {Indeed The owners of Paradise today are busy and fruitful}. Employing someone in a dream other than his job, if the job he moved to was sufficient, then this indicates renewal of livelihood, spouses, children and worship. If someone sees that he is applying for a job and he agrees to that job, if he is already an employee, then this means He would leave that job, with great regret, and it was said that it would be problems and difficulties in his profession. Life, and it was said that sad news would come to him. But if he was unemployed and felt forced to give up the dream job, this means that he is not afraid of anything. Whoever sees that someone else has taken over his job, this indicates a loss of money. And if a woman sees that she is applying for a job and she is not An employee, everything she wants at the present time will come true for her. As for a woman who sees that she is applying for a job and is in fact an employee, this means that she will be promoted at work. What if a woman sees that she is signing an employment contract in a dream, this means an increase in the monthly salary. And seeing a girl Unmarried to work, unfortunately, indicates illness, and it is said that she is sad and misguided. As you see, dismissal from work in a dream. For an unmarried girl, this means that her situation will change from bad to better. Diligence in the workplace in the dream

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about black dogs for a single woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about black dogs for single women: Interpretation of a dream about black dogs for single women may express bad events that will happen to her if she is able to approach her and hurt her. However, if she succeeds in escaping, this is a sign of the end of her worries and sorrows, and seeing these dogs panting after her is evidence of that. The extent of the difficulties that she finds on the way to her future, and we will learn about many interpretations through our topic today. What is the interpretation of a dream about black dogs for a single woman? When a girl sees in her dream that a black dog follows her and walks behind her whenever she goes or comes, then a young man is chasing her and wants to get close to her, But he has a high degree of bad morals and lack. From engagement and he must prevent him and not allow him to get too close. If in reality she lives in a remote place far from civilization and she sees the importance of having a guard dog with her in that place, then the dream shows the intensity of her anxiety and her feeling that she is not safe and lives far away from people. Perhaps he needs someone to comfort her and make her feel reassured. If the girl is not sincere in obedience and claims morality and virtue despite her violation, then what she does is what follows her in the form of a black dog. If the dog is very small and does not actually cause fear, but is afraid to see it, There are many negative thoughts running through his mind, and he may commit some foolishness that will cause many problems. For her. If this period was one of the difficult periods that she went through for the girl, then seeing black dogs is a sign of the serious impact of this period on herself and her need for someone to help her and give her some psychological and moral support, which is what it is. He needs. If some dogs met the girl and ran after her violently and she could not escape from her, then there is someone chasing her and wanting to harm her and unfortunately there is a high probability that she will fall into big trouble in the coming days. Therefore, you should be careful before entering into any new relationship, whether romantic or friendly, with a girl. Likewise, it could cause her harm. What is the interpretation of a dream about black dogs for single people by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin did not deviate from his interpretation of what we previously presented through the various details of the girl’s vision of these black dogs, but he added that his vision may express failure and disappointment that she suffers as a result of Her reluctance to make the appropriate decision. Friendship is not an easy task, so you have to choose the character that you accompany day and night and know all his secrets and secrets, because if he is not honest, he will be the cause of many crises and damage to the girl. Playing with dogs and having fun in front of the house without fear or anxiety is a sign of her ability. On facing the difficulties in her life through her adventurous personality without failing in her calculations. He also said that a girl who does not allow them to get close to her has very important qualities for any young lady. But if he is injured by a black dog and bleeds from it, then he is in serious danger in the future. She may marry a man with a bad temper who does not treat her as God and His Messenger have commanded us, and with him she will suffer
